title: Docs - Hybrid and multicloud architecture patterns: What's next
abstract:
# Docs - Hybrid and multicloud architecture patterns: What's next
Last reviewed 2023-12-14 UTC
- Learn how to approach [hybrid and multicloud architecture](/architecture/hybrid-multicloud-patterns-and-practices) and how to choose suitable workloads.
- Find out more about the [networking architecture patterns](/architecture/hybrid-multicloud-secure-networking-patterns) suitable for the selected hybrid and multicloud architecture patterns.
- Learn more about [Deployment Archetypes for Cloud Applications](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3498336) .
- Learn more about [commonly used application deployment and testing patterns](/architecture/application-deployment-and-testing-strategies) .
- Learn more how to [design and deploy an ecommerce web application](/solutions#section-3) using different architectures, including a [microservice-based ecommerce web application](https://cloud.google.com/solutions/ecommerce-web-app#section-1) using GKE, and a dynamic web application that's [Serverless API based](https://cloud.google.com/solutions/ecommerce-web-app#section-2)
